New ESC guidelines for VHD: Intervention in Asymptomatic Severe AS. A LVEF<55% has now become a Class IIa indication for intervention. In ACC guidelines, it is a IIb indication and with LVEF<60% on at least 3 serial imaging studies.

Updated ESC Prevention Guidelines

CAC score acknowledged as the "best-established imaging modality" to improve risk assessment

Risk reclassification **downward** with CAC mentioned for 1st time in ESC guidelines

Still IIb recomm, but anyway important steps in right direction
